Galebekwe Virginia Tsotso Tlhapi (amụrụ n'afọ 1979 ma ọ bụ n'afọ 1980) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa na-eje ozi ugbu a dị ka MEC maka nka, ọdịbendị, egwuregwu na ntụrụndụ na North West
Ọ bụ onye otu North West Provincial Legislature maka African National Congress.
Tlhapi bụ onye otu African National Congress na onye bụbu onye otu African Nacional Congress Youth League

Ọ bụ onye bụbu onye isi oche nke ANC Youth League na North West, onye bụbu otu kọmitii nchịkwa mpaghara nke ANC Youth Association na mpaghara Bojanala, na onye bụbu onyeisi kọmitii onye isi obodo maka mmepe akụ na ụba mpaghara na Bojanala District Municipality
A ṅụrụ Tlhapi iyi dị ka onye otu North West Provincial Legislature na 2 August 2016.

Mgbe ntuli aka mba na nke mpaghara nke afọ 2019 gasịrị, a họpụtara ya dị ka onye otu Executive Council for Arts, Culture, Sports and Recreation na North West Provincial Government site n'aka onye isi ala Job Mokgoro.
